mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD ( FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, FREE_WRITER, FREE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_FREE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{freeTitle}, #{freeWriter}, #{freeContent} )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO ,REF_BNO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_FREE_NO.CURRVAL, #{ORIGIN_NAME}, #{CHANGE_NAME}, #{FilePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT FB.FREE_NO, FB.FREE_TITLE, FB.FREE_WRITER, FB.FREE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(FB.FREE_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "FREE_CREATE_DATE", COUNT(DISTINCT g.RFREE_NO) AS LIKECOUNT FROM FREEBOARD FB LEFT JOIN FREEGOOD g ON FB.FREE_NO = g.RFREE_NO AND g.FREE_GOOD_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE FB.FREE_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY FB.FREE_NO, FB.FREE_TITLE, FB.FREE_WRITER, FB.FREE_COUNT, TO_CHAR(FB.FREE_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY FB.FREE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET FREE_COUNT = FREE_COUNT + 1 WHERE FREE_NO = #{freeNo} AND FREE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}

SELECT FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, FREE_WRITER, FREE_CREATE_DATE FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FREE_STATUS = 'Y' AND FREE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= 3
